descriptionlist.description: Blue, Green, Orange, Pink, Purple and Yellow
In order to use, just enable the Animated Cube Respring Icon in Anemone and respring for the changes to take effect.

Please Note: In order for this respring logo to work properly, the tweak "MakeRespringsGreatAgain" cannot be installed. Having it installed will cause the Animated Cube Respring Icon to not display properly. If you have "MakeRespringsGreatAgain," please uninstall it before installing the Animated Cube Respring Icon.
